import './App.css'; import './components/Navbar'; import Navbar from './components/Navbar'; import Home from './components/Home'; import EnsembleProject from './components/EnsembleProject'; import TraceProject from './components/TraceProject'; import ThermoKingProject from './components/protected/ThermoKingProject'; import TruistTradeProject from './components/TruistTradeProject'; import BranchPilotProject from './components/BranchPilotProject'; import About from './components/About'; import ScrollToTop from './components/ScrollToTop'; import { BrowserRouter as Router, Switch, Route, Link } from "react-router-dom"; function App() { return (

Projects

Convincing Truist's branch customers to transact digitally Bringing Truist's first all-digital brokerage account to market Designing a New Mobile Experience for Thermo King Customers Redesigning User Permissions for Tracer® Ensemble® Building a daylighting analysis tool in Trace 3D Plus

Credits

This site was designed, developed, and tested by Jonah Miller in 2023.

The site's design was inspired by a computer terminal - a nod to my background in engineering.
